definitions.definition: A thousand trillion ( logic: 1,000 × 1,000 ): 1 followed by fifteen zeros, 10 .
definitions.label_groups: US , modern British and Australian , short scale

definitions.definition: A million trillion ( logic: 1,000,000 ): 1 followed by twenty-four zeros, 10 .

main_definition: ( US , modern British and Australian , short scale ) A thousand trillion ( logic: 1,000 × 1,000 ): 1 followed by fifteen zeros, 10 .
secondary_definitions: ( dated , UK , Australia , long scale ) A million trillion ( logic: 1,000,000 ): 1 followed by twenty-four zeros, 10 .
